post: Were proud to announce the 10 finalists for the Bill of Rights Institutes National Civics Teacher of the Year Award! These educators inspire students to understand our nations history and their rights & responsibilities as citizens. Thanks to FileWave for sponsoring this years award. 🔗  https://bit.ly/464FiqY  #CivicEducation  #CivicTeachers  #TeacherRecognition  #EdChat

Kick off the Civic Star Challenge by choosing the theme that fits your classroom best 🌟 📘 Voting & Civic Engagement 📘 Revolution & Change 📘 Equality 📘 …and many more! Get started ➡️  https://bit.ly/4fOChOR  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #TeachersOfInstagram  #EdChat  #SocialStudies  #America250  #K12Teachers 📚🌟

#OTD, 250 years ago, King George III declared the American colonies to be in a state of rebellion. Read the text of the Kings proclamation and ask yourself, what was the significance of this moment, and why does this moment still matter to our national story? Discover more:  https://bit.ly/47Isxnc  #TDiH  #BRI250  #  #AmericanRevolution  #CivicIdentity

Booking a hotel or other travel? You can support civic education while you do it. TravelingToGive turns your everyday travel into donations for the Bill of Rights Institute. Click. Travel. Give. 🧳 Start here:  https://bit.ly/43XWUUk  #TravelDeals  #CivicEducation  #TravelingToGive  #SupportTeachers

Why join the Civic Star Challenge? 🌟 300+ chances to win 🌟 $200K+ in prizes 🌟 Recognition for your classroom and students K–12 teachers: Be part of Americas 250th celebration and inspire your students through civic learning. Enter today:  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #BRI250  #Teachers  #America250

Why did colonists finally declare independence? Use this video for Middle School students to analyze key texts about the Stamp Act, Declaratory Act, and Declaration of Independence. Along the way, students will uncover how debates over self-governance sparked a revolution, all while practicing essential skills for grouping primary sources. 🎥 Watch now:  https://bit.ly/45JszbV  #CivicEducation  #MiddleSchoolHistory  #AmericanRevolution  #SocialStudies

📣 Calling all teen Florida changemakersIDEAS WANTED! Have a project or just an idea to serve your community? You can showcase a community project or pitch an idea, and win up to $2,000! Hosted by the Bill of Rights Institute thanks to our sponsor Travelers. 📅 Oct 11 | UCF 🔗 Register now:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx  #CivicEducation  #StudentLeadership  #FloridaStudents  #MyImpactChallenge  #YouthLeadership

Busy teachers, weve made it simple: join the Civic Star Challenge with just 3 short questions. ✅ Use ready-to-go lessons tied to the Declaration of Independence ✅ Flexible for any grade or subject ✅ $200K+ in prizes, 300+ chances to win Get started today:  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #BRI250  #Teachers  #America250

Stand up for your state, fund a teacher near you. Our Civics Champion initiative connects donors with local educators to strengthen civic learning nationwide. Help classrooms in your state thrive:  https://bit.ly/40EsBAg  #CivicEngagement  #CivicsChampion  #EducationEquity  #SupportTeachers

Were grateful to TranslateLive for their support of our Civics for Everyone initiative. Their real-time translation tools ensure all students, regardless of language or ability, can access our free resources. Learn how you can support our initiative today: bit.ly/4jBYuQp  #CivicsForEveryone  #EdEquity  #LanguageAccess  #Inclusion
